ModMetaData.name: Command Palette
ModMetaData.author: Fluffy
ModMetaData.description:
all your commands in one place
<size=24>Features</size> Ever been annoyed about the ever increasing number of architect categories? Can’t find anything in the ‘Furniture’, ‘More Furniture’, ‘Furniture Plus’ and ‘RimKEA Furniture’ tabs?
Panic no longer, for Command Palette is here.
Right-click with nothing selected to open the command palette.
Recently used commands will be immediately shown. Type a few letters to show commands whose name or description are similar.
<size=24>Known Issues</size> None
<size=24>Version</size> This is version 1.7.104, for RimWorld 1.1.2652.
